snippet: Pistachio nuts, one of Iran’s most profitable products, appear to be latest victim of domestic inflation, so much so that the government has ordered a moratorium on exports.
abstract: Pistachio nuts, one of Iran’s most profitable products, appear to be latest victim of domestic inflation, so much so that government has ordered moratorium on exports as part of effort to increase supply at home and reduce price.
lead_paragraph: Pistachio nuts, one of Iran’s most profitable products, appear to be latest victim of domestic inflation, so much so that the government has ordered a moratorium on exports.
